document_data.name: Nateen
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Nateen''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''These street trash need to watch their tone. I don't tolerate disrespect.''|Fist Nateen}}
document_data.Description: Nateen had a [[human]] man with tanned skin tone, red hair, and beard. He wore a set of [[chainmail]] [[armor]] as part of the Flaming Fist uniform, decorated with the organization's emblem on a [[tabard]]. He was armed with a [[halberd]] and was ready to use it to punctuate his stern and cruel attitude.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Nateen was tasked with patrolling the Lower City, near the [[Basilisk Gate]]. He and his fellow patrolmen had no qualms with shutting protesters up with force.
